author: Trincay 80
comment: I have used McAfee Mobile Security free for for my phone for over 2 years now and am very satisfied. Notice it doesn't have a firewall like my PC Total Protection. Had to use another app. for firewall which allows  me to pick which continents I can block. This would be a great feature to be added to McAfee Mobile. Also noticed you can restore  contacts but nothing else. Instead of paying for Mobile it would also be great to combine with the  PC Total Protection. Love my McAfee products!

author: Sharon Briggs-Bumgarner
comment: I purchased McAFee Security Software for our family. To be honest, I wasn't expecting much security for the price I paid for the McAfee 10, which was at as a Prime Deal on Amazon & even though I had used McAfee before at a much smaller level, it wasn't anything special, if you know what I mean. Man, was & have I been totally shocked. McAfee is unbelievable how it protects our family. Excellent purchase on my part!!

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi Sharon! We are super excited for you! Thanks for choosing McAfee. We always strive to give you the best value for your money. We are glad you are enjoying our security on all your devices :)

author: Sam.L AV17 [SamAV17TM]
comment: This apps using a lot memory make my budget 1gb ram phone slow and lag. I really like that concept shows my phone performance on right screen this should be every 7 minutes to tell your phone performances.              Thanks. Regards, Sam

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi Sam! Thanks for reaching out. We would like to take a look at to your configuration to see what's causing the problem with performance. For immediate assistance, please reach us at service.mcafee.com. We are available 24/7.

title: I like it but using so much ram memory

author: Stephen Gallop
comment: This app is great at protecting all of my devices with the exception of my huawei mate 10 pro... As it keeps switching McAfee security off not sure why this is?UPDATE 25/2/18 problem seems to have resolved by deleting a duplicate network provider app thanks for the response McAfee

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi Stephen! Thanks for reaching out. We would certainly like to take a look at your huawei phone to ensure the app and device settings are configured correctly. Also, please check to see if accessibility has been turned On for Mcafee mobile security in Android Settings. For assistance, please reach us at service.mcafee.com.

comment: Bells and whistles,ahh,no.that's for kids! 100 percent detection of newest and oldest viruses by AV-Test?...YES. McAfee keeps me from having to buy a new phone and keeps me safe on the web. One of the very best in the security business  and they are known for it...I NEVER HAVE TO WORRY WITH McAfee. They are only rated low because of people wrongly wanting fluff instead of realizing this is TOP SECURITY. PUT McAfee on your phone and play and go to sleep with peace!

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi there! Thanks a lot for your trust. Glad you like our app. We are sure you will continue to enjoy our security experience :)

author: Chris july
comment: Was a great product for a smartphone. The latest updates now don't allow anything to be done other than optimise all. Other options are still available but you can't access them. This is on annual Xperia and same issue on Samsung S7. Please fix!

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the feedback! We are glad you are enjoying the performance.

comment: Feel like Web is safer for me, always informs me that I am protected when on web. Have had no virus, adware or other problems. Warns if a website is dangerous or suspicious.  Definitely Do recommend McAfee for your protection.

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi there! We are super excited to hear that!. McAfee has one of the best virus detection rates.Thanks for the recommendation, it means a lot :)

author: Steven Wicks
comment: The latest update is draining my battery. It's using like 10% an hour even when my phone is idle. If it carries on i'll be unistalling the app.  It's kept my phone, PC and tablet safe so can't complain. Feel safe browsing on any platform now with the warnings about the safety of certain malicious sites

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Steven! We are glad you are enjoying our security on all your devices. Regarding the battery consumption, we would like to take a look at your app and device configuration to see what's causing the issue. Please get in touch with us at service.mcafee.com anytime. We'll gladly assist!.

Managed a work around but can't use find with it so only 4 stars.

author: Ralph Pacheco
comment: Amazing app! Easy to use and does everything i need. The security makes you feel comfortable especially the browser it doesn't give you a fake website and if you lost your phone just simply turn on the tracker. Great app 5⛥!

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi Ralph! Thanks for the feedback. We are really glad you are enjoying the features and functionality of our app :)

Updating, locating, wiping data, locking device, blocking phishing, whishing mails and malicious viruses, trojans, worms and fraudulent websites. Everything needed to protect your cell and its data is there. McAfee is just fantastic.

comment: Was a great app until latest update.  Now all the functions go to a black screen.   Uninstalled and reinstalled, 2 days later same problem on my galaxy s7.

author: Thomas Simon
comment: Great app, easy to use and does everything I need. I only gave 4 stars because they don't allow a second device for the annual fee like other companies.  If you are like me and have a phone and a tablet then the $30 each annually is a bit much. I had Norton before this and had problems with it crashing but at least the annual fee covered both my phone and tablet.

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi Thomas! Thanks for reaching out to us. Glad you like our app. We do have subscription packages that can be installed in multiple devices. We would like to talk to you about this in detail. Please get in touch with us at service.mcafee.com. We are available 24/7.

author: R B
comment: Sticks its oar into everything & McAfee seem to think they have the right to rule your life. Privacy nightmare.

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out to us. McAfee requires a few permissions to ensure that your device is secure. This permission helps with backup and anti-theft security. This is done at a device level and we do not have access to your personal data.  For any clarifications, please get in touch with us at service.mcafee.com

author: John Moore
comment: If you like your phone that slow and needed to be permanently connected to a mains supply then go for it. Yes it does what it says ok but God I just wanted to through my phone at the wall the only thing saving it was the cable attaching it to a power socket. Since removing the app I have charged my phone twice in four days instead of putting it down on a charging plate everytime I sat down

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi John! We're sorry to hear about your experience. We would like to take a closer look at your device configuration to see what's causing the problem with battery consumption. Please get in touch with us at service.mcafee.com anytime. We are available 24/7.

comment: EDIT (2-12)I like it again.  I did have to wait about an hour and a half before seeing the next screen which was the update info.  After that,  the menu came up. I'm thinking maybe I'll be back in a bit too re-evaluate the five stars.  I usually don't max out, but I was impressed at first,  then the most recent update hit.  I'm still trying to see what, if anything it will do to my battery life.   EDIT (2-11-18) I did like it.  However, since the most recent update, I click on the icon and the app page appears but nothing after that.  My phone turns itself off before anything changes (2x so far).  WTH?

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi Pat! Thanks for taking the time to post a review. We are sure it will meet all your expectations. If you ever need anything, you can get in touch with us at service.mcafee.com. We are available 24/7.

author: Greg McNamara
comment: Some good features but shame about the call blocking feature not working in Android 4.4+ (basically all current Android smartphones...). Wasted hours with McAfee support trying to get call blocking to work, then just read on Play that it isn't compatible with my phone. Why even have the feature appear in the app?

author: jeff gorton
comment: I figured I'd give it a try since it came with my subscription,  and I'm glad I did. Works great , seems very light on the processor,  and let's me know so many details . Review is still just as good, feel much safer having it on my phones. Used it to locate a stolen phone update: worth every penny. Thank you for an amazing product and ease of use. Saved me 800 bucks and let me catch some worthless scum. Update on 9-27-17. Review is not even enough to say how much i like the product , and I've added a smart watch since and it's been great. 12-15-17: update review. App update ruined it. I no longer can do many of the options I loved. Cannot locate devices anymore. Gives me a login screen where the map should be. Even when I login, it gives some cookies error. I can verify I let cookies be set and yet locate service still will not work. I loved this app for years until this week. Fix app and I'll review again. So so sad they ruined the app for us paying customers. Pay my fees every year . If they don't fix app I'll cancel and find another provider next week. 2-11-18. Bugs seem to be fixed, back to 5 star review

reply.author: McAfee LLC
reply.content: Hi Jeff! We always want to bring you the best experience. Thanks a lot :)

Can also copy contacts and media etc to copy onto new device when you change phones.
